General.Name: Tianma Microelectronics Co Ltd
General.Description: Tianma Microelectronics Co., Ltd. designs, manufactures, and supplies display solutions and related support services worldwide. Its products include monochromes; LTPS, industrial displays, medical displays, and intelligent device displays; and automotive displays, such as cluster, center information, head up, mirror, smart car cockpit, and rear seat entertainment displays, as well as smart phone, smart wearables, tablet PC, and ultrabook. The company was founded in 1983 and is based in Shenzhen, China.
